message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SI 

This paper deals with the analysis of neural network loss surfaces, which is a topic that falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper specifically focuses on two different error metrics, quadratic loss and entropic loss, which are commonly used in neural network training. Therefore, the paper could also be classified under neural networks (cs.NE) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The visualisation technique proposed in the paper involves gradient-based random sampling, which is a common technique used in computer vision (cs.CV) and signal processing (cs.SI). Overall, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG, followed by cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, and cs.SI.
